entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
